statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed, timestamp, location FROM EnergyUsage ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed, timestamp, location FROM EnergyUsage WHERE location = 'Living Room'
SELECT device_id, manufacturer, model, installation_date FROM DeviceInfo
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage INNER JOIN DeviceInfo ON EnergyUsage.device_id = DeviceInfo.device_id
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed, location FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage INNER JOIN DeviceInfo ON EnergyUsage.device_id = DeviceInfo.device_id WHERE device_id = 3 AND manufacturer = 'ABC' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY device_id HAVING max_energy_consumed > 5000
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS usage_count FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY device_id HAVING usage_count >= 100 ORDER BY usage_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM EnergyUsage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM energy_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumption FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT location, manufacturer FROM device_info WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM energy_readings WHERE device_id = 123456 ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC;
SELECT installation_date, location FROM device_info ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, reading_timestamp, energy_consumption FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_consumption) AS max_consumption FROM energy_readings GROUP BY device_id
SELECT device_id, COUNT(id) AS readings_count FROM energy_readings GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5
SELECT e.device_id, d.location, e.energy_consumption FROM energy_readings e JOIN device_info d ON e.device_id = d.device_id WHERE e.energy_consumption < 50 ORDER BY e.energy_consumption ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM EnergyDevices WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT device_name, location FROM EnergyDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyAnalytics WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_usage FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_usage FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_usage > 100;
SELECT ec.device_id, ec.timestamp, ed.device_name FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN EnergyDevices ed ON ec.device_id = ed.device_id;
SELECT ed.device_name, ea.efficiency_score FROM EnergyDevices ed JOIN EnergyAnalytics ea ON ed.device_id = ea.device_id WHERE ea.efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDevices WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, efficiency_score FROM EnergyEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating = 'Excellent';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;
SELECT location, device_type FROM DeviceInfo WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND device_type = 'Appliance';
SELECT * FROM EnergyReports WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_energy_consumed BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT device_id, efficiency_rating FROM EnergyEfficiency WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8 ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM energy_devices WHERE sensor_type='temperature';
SELECT device_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM energy_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, cost_value, cost_currency FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_costs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_costs.device_id;
SELECT device_id, optimization_strategy FROM energy_optimization WHERE optimization_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY optimization_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM energy_devices WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_readings ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_readings.device_id;
SELECT device_name, cost_value, cost_currency FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_costs ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_costs.device_id WHERE cost_value > 100;
SELECT device_name, optimization_strategy FROM energy_devices JOIN energy_optimization ON energy_devices.device_id = energy_optimization.device_id ORDER BY optimization_timestamp DESC;
